tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trader_profiles (
    trader_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    preferences JSON
)

CREATE TABLE trader_profiles (
  trader_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trader_preferences (
  trader_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  investment_horizon VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  preferred_assets VARCHAR(100),
  trading_strategy VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TraderProfiles (
    trader_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE traders (
  trader_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trader_id INT REFERENCES traders(trader_id),
  risk_tolerance VARCHAR(10),
  investment_horizon VARCHAR(20),
  preferred_sectors TEXT,
  preferred_assets TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trader_id INT REFERENCES traders(trader_id),
  recommendation_text TEXT,
  recommendation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trader_id INT REFERENCES traders(trader_id),
  notification_text TEXT,
  notification_date DATE,
  is_read BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
)

CREATE TABLE trader_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE trader_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_id INT,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20),
    investment_horizon VARCHAR(20),
    preferred_asset_class VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE trading_recommendations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    confidence_score DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE trading_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_id INT,
    trade_date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    trade_type VARCHAR(10),
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE trader_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_id INT,
    time_period VARCHAR(20),
    returns DECIMAL(10,2),
    benchmark_returns DECIMAL(10,2),
    win_ratio DECIMAL(4,2)
)
